songs.title: DayDreamin’
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Yeah, okay
[?]
Alright, yeah

[Verse]
Scary thoughts come to thought when I’m lost in it
Life’s big dream and we all lost in it
Opinions are stated by those who’re higher faded
Higher rate to change the clouds open up, gate’s in
Music starts playing
Something peaceful, wonderful, beautiful
New to those who knew of, the game
Talking like back in the day
Like old school sundays
Prepare for monday
The one day of the week that you hated with the passion
Night before couldn’t sleep
Turn on your favorite record, Summertime by Big Willie
That will get you in the zone for just chillin’
